title: Angelina Jolie is the picture of happiness on a day out with her kids to tour the Colosseum in Rome
text:
She's traveling around the globe ahead of the release of Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil.

And Angelina Jolie took a break from her busy press schedule abroad and made sure to see the sights of the historic Colosseum in Rome, Italy.

The 44-year-old actress seemed enamored with the landmark as she enjoyed a personal tour with four of her children by her side.

Tourist: Angelina Jolie took a break from her busy press schedule abroad and made sure to see the sights of the historic Colosseum in Rome, Italy

Angelina bundled up in a heavy black peacoat with thick buttons running the length of her jacket.

Jolie wore a floor-length black dress with pretty eyelet detailing, paired with matching black stilettos.

She wore her signature over-sized shades and carried a black leather purse with a gold chain across her shoulder.

History: The 44-year-old actress seemed enamored with the landmark as she enjoyed a personal tour with four of her children by her side

Staying warm: Angelina bundled up in a heavy black peacoat with thick buttons running the length of her jacket

Dressed up: Jolie wore a floor-length black dress with pretty eyelet detailing, paired with matching black stilettos

Shaded: She wore her signature over-sized shades and carried a black leather purse with a gold chain across her shoulder

The Lara Croft: Tomb Raider star parted her shoulder-length chocolate brown hair down the middle.

Along for the journey were four of Jolie's children: Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and 11-year-old twins Vivienne and Knox.

Her son Pax, 15, seemed to miss out on the big adventure and Maddox, 18, was likely at university in South Korea.

The Lara Croft: Tomb Raider star parted her shoulder-length chocolate brown hair down the middle.

Taking it all in: Shiloh looked comfortable in a black sweatshirt and white Vesace shorts while snapping photos with an iPhone

Family time: Along for the journey were four of Jolie's children: Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and 11-year-old twins Vivienne and Knox

Shiloh looked comfortable in a black sweatshirt and white Vesace shorts while snapping photos with an iPhone.

Zahara kept things casual in an all-black ensemble complete with a T-shirt and slacks.

Vivienne stayed close to her mother's side wearing a bright blue shirt and jeans rolled up to her ankles.

Views: Zahara kept things casual in an all-black ensemble complete with a T-shirt and slacks

There in spirit: Her son Pax, 15, seemed to miss out on the big adventure and Maddox, 18, was likely at university in South Korea

Tired: Vivienne stayed close to her mother's side wearing a bright blue shirt and jeans rolled up to her ankles
description: The 44-year-old actress seemed enamored with the landmark as she enjoyed a personal tour with four of her children by her side.
